moves.2... d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nc6 5. Bb5: Gains a tempo, allows White to castle, pins Black's knight to the king and threatens the knight. Threatens a fork following capture of Black's knight.
moves.5... Nf6 6. Nxc6: Opens an attack on Black's queen and threatens a fork on c6.
moves.6... bxc6 7. Bxc6+: Forks Black's King and Rook. Should be marked 7.Bxc6+!!
